name: SIEGE Public Alpha
description:
SIEGE™ is a Team based First person Tactical Multiplayer shooter based on Rainbow Six Siege with our own twist.

  • Play as Recon - choose your class and get on the mission with your friends to stop the opposing team from getting away with their plans
  • Play as Delta - choose your class and get on the mission with your friends, make a plan to stop Recon from interfering with your plans.

Recon

Hostage Mission - The Hostage is in the opponent's custody, It's your job to lead your team and rescue the hostage.Set up a plan on how you want to tackle the situation. (The game is totally multiplayer, nothing is AI based , except for the hostage, ) Eliminate the opposing team, but be careful as you will have only one chance per round to bring the hostage to safety.

Bomb Defusal - Your Opponent is guarding a number of bombs in certain places, It is you, and your team's job to diffuse all the bombs before they explode.

Hijacker - There is a airplane in air which is hijacked by your opponent it is your job to get inside by parachuting in and eliminating all the opponent.

Delta

Hostage Mission -The Hostage your team's custody, It's your job to lead your team and defend the hostage from the attackers.Set up a plan on how you want to tackle the situation. Eliminate the opposing team, but be careful as you will have only one chance per round to bring the hostage to safety.

Bomb Defusal - You are guarding a number of bombs in certain places, It is you, and your team's job to defend all the bombs before they are diffused by the opponent.

Hijacker - There is a airplane in air which is hijacked by your team .It is your team's job to eliminate all the opponent , but be always cautious as they can get in numbers of ways.

The risks and challenges

The concept of our game is very heavy to carry on without alot of money.We were very much inspired by Rainbow Six Siege , But we want to make a game with everything to its best.For making that happen we need more people to work on the game and as everyone works for a fair day's pay, we need more money to be invested to help the team grow.

The Team

LAI MASSIVE® is an Indie Game developing team, with 8 members in total.We started off from 2011, developing very small titles at the time. Our first title was a racing game named "The Reels" which was cancelled due to the low amount of people working on the game.The team was started off by Meheraj , The producer and the lead game developer of most of the titles. Later 3 more members were joined named Andrew - Model Designer , Kaushal - programmer , Tahiyat - Modeler.

Since than we have released 6 games till now, and they were all Free-To-Play. This is indeed our 7th project , and 4 more people joined to help in the project, Omar Sebali - Marketing Guy , Ben - Marketing Guy , MarcoStyle - Promoter , Milo - Coordinator. So we have opened this kickstarter for our latest game "SIEGE" so that you guys can help the game shape up Perfect.We need more people to work on the team and a better server , so we are in need of fund to make that happen.
